text: The 1977 U.S. Women's Open was the 31st U.S. Women's Open, held July 8–12 at Rolling Green Golf Club in Springfield, Pennsylvania, a suburb west of Philadelphia. JoAnne Carner, the 1971 champion, won in a Monday playoff over defending champion Sandra Palmer by a score of The two had tied at 292 (+8), four strokes ahead of ==Past champions in the field== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || R3 || R4 || Total||To par||Finish |- |align=left|JoAnne Carner||align=left| || 1971 ||71||71||77||73||292||+8||1 |- |align=left| Sandra Palmer ||align=left| || 1975 ||70||74||73||75||292||+8||2 |- |align=left|Susie Berning ||align=left| ||1968, 1972, 1973||73||76||79||75||303||+19||T8 |- |align=left|Sandra Spuzich ||align=left| ||1966||76||78||74||79||307||+23||T17 |- |align=left|Mary Mills ||align=left| ||1963||75||77||77||81||310||+26||T30 |} Source: ==Final leaderboard== Sunday, July 11, 1976 {| class="wikitable" !
